data.title: Kris Jenner's Kids React After Her Tumor Diagnosis
data.meta_description: Find out how Kris Jenner's children reacted when she shared her ovary tumor diagnosis on the July 4 episode of The Kardashians.
data.text:
Kris Jenner's family has her back.

After the 68-year-old shared that she was getting her ovaries removed due to doctors discovering a tumor on one of the organs, her kids rallied behind her.

"To have a surgery and remove your ovaries is a really big deal," Kim Kardashian sympathized on the July 4 episode of The Kardashians, during which Kris tearfully disclosed her diagnosis. "I couldn’t even imagine being in that situation and how you would feel really scared to be going through that."

In a sentiment sister Kourtney Kardashian, saying in a separate confessional, "I totally understand how my mom is feeling because I would feel the same way."

"It’s your womanly power," the Poosh founder continued. "It doesn’t mean it’s taking away who she is or what she’s experienced, but I would feel this sentimental feeling of what it’s created.”
